Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: 2ND INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not after); MIDDLE KINGDOM (not before)
Name: Lid for a vase for cosmetics
Description: This might be the lid associated with vase for cosmetics L 526, as the alabaster of both pieces bears similarities.  Notably, the circular mark left on the surface of the lip of the vase is similar to that on the lid.  One of the surfaces is totally flat, while the other is very lightly rounded.
